name: 10 Violas - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 10 Violas ensemble. Warm, rich midrange tone. Essential for inner harmonies and lush orchestral textures.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with sustained - add an articulation change entry, switching to spiccato - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained, then back to short articulation. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble violas (10 players). CC1 controls dynamics for long articulations. No legato available. Use velocity for short articulations.
